name: Lasso-Loop Whiplash
description:
You're a horse minding your own business when the sheriff caught you in his lasso. Show him who's boss by smacking him into as many different objects as possible!

This game was made for Ludum Dare 47 under the theme "Stuck in a Loop".

The Linux version was tested on Ubuntu 18.04 with an AMD RX580 8GB.

For the HTML5 version go to https://adiwan.itch.io/lasso-loop-whiplash-webgl
